short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that translates helpshift messages using KantanAI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is use to translate Helpshift chat messages. 
This extension is very intuitive and will help users translate the Helpshift chat messages to/from the client that they are speaking to. By simply plugging in your Kantan API token and language pairs in our extension's popup, you are all set to begin translating your message!
